page.title: 09Manor Farm Welton.
page.content: {MANOR FARM, WELTON Just behind our school is Manor Farm. Mr Knowles is the farmer and he has about 450 acres of land owned by the Dutchy.It is a mixed farm and they grow wheat,oats,barley,peas and potatoes as well as having 140 milking frezian cows.As well as the farmer there is his son and four farmworkers to work the land. They use modern machines and have tractors,mowers,a baler,spreaders,seed drill,sprayers and various trailers.They grow much of the food for their cattle and at the moment they are making silage and hay. The milk is cllected each day and taken by tanker to Frome for processing.Much of the processed milk ends up in London.The farmhouse was built in 1620 and is a big stone house.We interviewed Mr Knowles on July 12th.1985.
